code: import React,{useState}from"react";import EditProfile from"./EditProfile-component";import"./UserProfile-styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserProfile=_ref=>{let{onLogout}=_ref;const[showEditModal,setShowEditModal]=useState(false);const[userData,setUserData]=useState({username:localStorage.getItem("username"),email:localStorage.getItem("email")});const handleProfileUpdate=updatedData=>{setUserData(updatedData);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-profile__avatar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/default-avatar.png",alt:"Profile Avatar"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-profile__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Username:"})," ",userData.username]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",userData.email||"Not provided"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"user-profile__edit-button",onClick:()=>setShowEditModal(true),children:"\u041D\u0430\u043B\u0430\u0448\u0442\u0443\u0432\u0430\u043D\u043D\u044F \u043F\u0440\u043E\u0444\u0456\u043B\u044E"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"user-profile__logout",onClick:onLogout,children:"\u0412\u0438\u0445\u0456\u0434"}),showEditModal&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditProfile,{onClose:()=>setShowEditModal(false),onSave:handleProfileUpdate,currentUsername:userData.username,currentEmail:userData.email})]});};export default UserProfile;
